review_title: I love how the controls work.
one_reviews_text: Big Mechwarrior fan. Can't wait for the full version. Looks good and works good. Not nearly as clunky to operate the mechs as the other VR mech game.

review_title: LOVED IT! I hope a FULL GAME comes soon!
one_reviews_text: Although only a demo for a smart phone game, this is really immersive and great entertainment! I really hope they make a full campaign game. It reminds me of Titanfall, which is one of my favorite games of all time.
is this the full game i hope not i want more it so good i love te normal one but now its in vr

Really enjoy the game/demo.  Lost the sound after a couple of plays.  I have a Rift S and when I push the game menu sound comes on and then off when I hit resume.  Tried uninstalling and reinstalling wasn't any help.

No control pad needed. Works great with Rift S controllers. Way better than playing on my iPad. When are you going to finish this?!?! Also add ControlPad (Bluetooth Control) to the iPad and Android versions please. My iPads get heavy after a while.
It was good fun, now bring on the full game with multiplayer co-operative and death match and you have a winner!

the demo a\was fun and would love to see the full game. the perfect vr game for me is a titanfall 2 like experice(check the game out) and this has a lot of what i want in a vr game.(respawn make titanfall 3 a vr title)

review_title: A full version for VR needs to happen.
one_reviews_text: This was the best experience.  A complete throw back to Mechwarrior: Clans series, but also altogether new.  I keep coming back to it even though there are mech games out there, this title did everything well: Controls, Interaction, Weapon systems.  Not too complicated, not too simple.  Please release a full game!
Great looking game, hurry up and finish it!
I played through it twice. Simple controls, easy to play. I would prefer that the arms actually aim rather than the head so I can look around.

This is exactly how a mech control is done right.  You aim
 by looking at your target and after a few seconds of practice, it's easy to strafe as well.  My only complaint is that it is rather dark so a lot of the details do get lost. If this was converted to a full VR game I'd be one of the first to buy it in a heart beat.

review_title: same will buy it for sure
one_reviews_text: let me know once out
it sould be a half star beacuse dizzy in the game the suck
Good Demo !!!!!!! But When is the Full Verison Coming Out.... I will buy it...
best demo ever
nice demo
When I enter the game, there is no audio. When I click on the Oculus home button, audio is back. So it's only there when I can't even see the screen.

review_title: Want to know where the full game is?
one_reviews_text:
This is a superb VR demo... But If you want to know where the full game is... click on the pixonic.com web-link in the game details.

 Its all on their website. The original War Robots game is on Google Play for free.  This VR version is I guess a reimagining of it but it seems if i've read it right that it was a 'crowd funded' kick-starter that for some reason (marketing maybe?) didn't make its target. 
 The last funding target date I saw was May 2018 and it missed it's target by a considerable margin.  I just hope they haven't given up.  I can't help but think that they might have helped themselves if they'd explained some of this in their game detail so that more people would have clicked on their link.  But that's just speculation.  Maybe programming for VR is still an emerging market that is still too young and limited to be successfully crowd funding for it.

Is it worth downloading this FREE VR version? YES definitely.. I've used it as a demo for friends to introduce them to VR and they are amazed every time by this

Very intuitive controls that work well with touch controllers. Graphics are crisp  and smooth delivering quality immersion.
Very fun, short game.

review_title: its the best game iv ever playd
one_reviews_text: good
The demo was amazing but it's only availible on android and iOS? We need a full Windows version asap. We need this game

you have to bring a full version of this game to VR .. PVP with this type of mech game .. is a must .. i love it .. short and sweet this game .. but you can see that could can be so much more and as a VR game .. would work nice in VR esports and dont take your time about it .. right now their are three good VR mech games out right now (archangel hellfire - code 51 arena - VOX ) this war robot would fit nice with these three .. i hope there more to come...

Love the demo, short but great. I hope the full version comes out. Had no problems running it on my machine. You get the sense you are in the robot. Reminds of an old favorite Mech Warrior though this is nothing like it. The graphics are great and my computer doesn't have issues, runs fast with no gliches. Again can't wait for the full version....

no sound when i played it quite anoying
i wish that was a real vr game not just a demo for some suck mobile game...
It's free and it's an awesome giant robot pilot experience. Although not perfect, it's free and it will give you a glimpse into how awesome giant robot fights can be in VR

Awesome Demo that leaves me wanting more.

Having it as an advert to a mobile game is dissapointing and leaves me no desire to play the mobile game. We have Mechwarrior Online, The VR game is one I could buy without question and recommend to a lot of other players who like myself would be streaming this ALOT. I was looking for the buy button as soon as I finished that scenario.

I would love a full VR game. I would switch turning as a move with the touch sticks, but continue to use head motion for torso twisting/aiming. Multiplayer would be so awesome. Maybe class based so each team has like an assault, a recon and a few brawlers?
Agreed, this should be a game!
this demo should turn into the real gamebut in vr. this should be multiplayer and can select different robots like in the mobile game. PLEASE make this one the actual game but in vr with multiplayer.

I would so be down for a game like this! Just without the aiming with where you are looking, it's a bit awkward when trying to look at your surroundings and end up walking face first into a wall.... other than that I want a full version of this!
Fun sci-fi mech sim, looking out  for full version, thanks!

This is a fun demo. I would like to see a full game. Only problem I experienced is the sound won't come on except when the oculus menu is up. However when the menu is up you can't play the game. Even without sound though it was fun :)
Best demo!!!! Full Game please!
Aiming with yuour head with no way to stop is terrible. However, with Oculus touch to control direction and weapons will be awesome if they make it into a full game.
Only a demo. An excelent demo. I want to play the full game!
Been a W.R. player for a long time. i would fund this in a big way... wave of the future, don't wait for the next set.

review_title: Wish there was a full length game :-(

I wish I could buy a full game based on this featurette. It brings back my memories of MechWarrior, but with awesome controls and a great view.

review_title: Please make this game for Oculus!
one_reviews_text: This is just a playable (single-mission) advert for a mobile game, sadly. If they would make the full game for Oculus, I would definitely buy it.
There should a full version of this game, demo was great but still expecting to see it in full version
i used to play this on android but it tired quickly due to the platform, this is so much better. please make a full game youve already done half the work

the demo was really fun and awesome to play i really wanted to get the game then when i went to the page for the "full game" it was a crappy little mobile game set in third person with lame graphics. Make a game like this demo please someone make a game like this demo
Really hope they decide to make this into a full game and not just use it to advertise the mobie game.

This is amazing...but its 7 mins long, where is the full game, I wanna purchase it please. I tried other mech games on my friends(ArchAngel) and that doesn't hold a candle to how well this looked and played, it even looked good on my 1050 ti...

review_title: Great potential for the mech lovers
one_reviews_text: Super cool 10 minute demo! One suggestion for the developper : allow aiming with the right stick! Head movement should be used to lock on missiles and look around. Aiming with the head is not good for prolonged periods of time and aiming with the head limits situational awareness : you cant look around and keep your guns trained on the oponent at the same time!

review_title: Make this a game (3 Years still Waiting)
one_reviews_text: This is a good start and would make a good game. the movment controlls need some work (did not like that all the movment was on one stick i was thinking the right stick would do side walking), and head aiming is not a bad way of doing the aim but being an old school MW player it seems a bit slow. but still a 5 star rating just hope to see more from this.
review_feedback:
Hey! We're running the Kickstarter for the full version. It's a buy-to-play multiplayer action game:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pixonic/war-robots-vr/description

We definitely will keep improving the controls — in competitive environment this alone makes HUGE a difference.

one_reviews_text: I have been playing mech games since they began with wire frame graphics. This is one of the best I have tried. Nice mechanics. Graphics are a tad dark for me but very nice. Game play was intuitive and easy to pick up. I look forward to a full version.

review_title: Why is this not in full production yet?!
one_reviews_text: An amazing demo that leaves one wanting MORE MORE MOOAAR. Excellent visually, incredibly simple to play, yet fun. This should be made into a full game rather than just a teaser for the android phone app.

review_title: Short but immersive, look forward to it
one_reviews_text: As a big fan of MechWarrior games this looks very promising and in VR has me drooling for battle.  Very short but got my attention, now want the full experience, hopefully it will get made.

I thought the demo was actually pretty good. Feeling like you're sitting in a giant mech feels awesome. I was dissapointed to find out that it's only a demo for a mobile game; because they pulled off the VR so well here. Hopefully they make a full PC version with multiplayer, upgrades, and maybe even new mechs.

After decades of difficult control schemes, we finally have a mech experience that works! Unfortunately it's just a demo, and the audio isn't in the headset and can't be turned up or down--I had to physically turn off my speakers not to wake anyone!
Make It please this demo into a full game
60 seconds of what might come to be a simple point and shoot mech platform. till then, 60 seconds of hold down buttons till things explode. do it 3 more times. thanks for trying the game out.

review_title: AWSOME (but can we have a full game)
one_reviews_text: this is a great demo it was better than I thought it wald be but can you please make a full game please becuase i loved it so much thank you for makeing this demo for us to try out:)
Head controls can sometimes spin you in a circle, but that's good in the battle. Grad both triggers and kill some enemies. Great fun!

This game is infinitely more fun than Archangel.  It's basically a free demo that's an advertisement for some mobile game.  But the few minutes of gameplay are absolutely a blast and leave you wondering why nobody has made this into a full release AAA title yet.  And yes, Oculus touch controllers do work (as a gamepad).  In case  you're wondering, I had to refund Archangel on the recent sale because it was so boring and I downloaded this game twice (Steam and now on here).  Highly recommend this VR demo to show off to friends and family for quick, intense, and easy gameplay.
review_feedback:
Thank you for playing!
Meanwhile, we're going to make a full-blown multiplayer game based on the same tech! Here's a Kickstarter for it: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pixonic/war-robots-vr/description

one_reviews_text: Love the game, however the audio output is not in my headset! Detracts from what could be an amazing expereince. When I pause the game it pipes to the headset, but the minute I go back into gameplay I don't hear the audio.
Control a mech with machine guns and rocket launchers for 5 minutes! Fun but too short!
I don't get nauseous easily anymore in VR but this did it. It's the side movement. Plus, the graphics feel like something out of a PS2 and the gameplay is boring.
Title was very misleading...
That was BADA** just wish they didn't end it so quickly
Misleading
good idea, but the sound was delivered by the monitor, not VR. Must be fixed for a better imersion.

Mechwarrior IS one of the greatest video gaming series' of all time. This is a brief look at having your own Mech. I could do this forever! BE in my mech FOREVER! I WANT THIS GAME!! WITH JUMP JETS! AND VARIANTS AND MORE TURNING OPTIONS! YEAH, I'M ALL CAPPING BECAUSE I WANT MY OWN MECH! IN MY HOUSE!! Great job, guys. Really great potential! Thank you!
review_feedback:
Thank you for such a great review!
We recently started to make a transition of The Skirmish into a real multiplayer game. Same feel, same concept — just more of everything. And better!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pixonic/war-robots-vr/description

one_reviews_text: This needs to be a fullblown game in VR. It reminds me of Mechwarrior, somewhat, and I'd love to pilot a mech in PVP battles. I subtracted one star because the audio was coming out of my speakers the first time I tried to start it. I had to restart Oculus to get the audio to play through the headphones.  Very very short, but it had me wanting more... not on a phone though.
review_feedback:
We're actually going for it!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pixonic/war-robots-vr/description

one_reviews_text: it was an interesting concept and easy to play. But why is the sound routed to my computer speakers and not the headset? And it would be much nicer to be able to not have to walk the direction I look.
Really fun VR Mechwarrior-esque experience. I think they really nailed the movement and aiming inside the mech. Love the music too. Looking forward to a full game!
good demo please make the full game

This is a really good example of VR!! Please look forward and make this into a full game! It would be fantastic!!! Just tried the mini ipad game of this and really no justice compared to VR. Get this working for VR then you really have something.
